Class YahtzeeView

java.lang.Object
yahtzee.YahtzeeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class YahtzeeView extends Object implements Observer
This class represents the view component of the Yahtzee game.

    • YahtzeeView

      public YahtzeeView(BoardGamesView mainMenu)
      Constructor for loading a saved Yahtzee game.
      Parameters:
      mainMenu - - The main menu view to return to after the game.

    • YahtzeeView

      public YahtzeeView(BoardGamesView mainMenu, String player1, String player2)
      Constructor for starting a new Yahtzee game.
      Parameters:
      mainMenu - - The main menu view to return to after the game.
      player1 - - The name of player 1.
      player2 - - The name of player 2.

      private void setupUI(String player1Name, String player2Name, YahtzeeInstance loadedGame)
      Sets up the user interface for the Yahtzee game.
      Parameters:
      player1Name - - The name of player 1 (null if loading a game).
      player2Name - - The name of player 2 (null if loading a game).
      loadedGame - - The loaded YahtzeeInstance (null if starting a new game).

    • animateDiceRoll

      private void animateDiceRoll(int dieIndex, int finalValue)
      Animates the rolling of a die at the specified index to its final value.
      Parameters:
      dieIndex - - The index of the die to animate.
      finalValue - - The final value of the die after rolling.

    • checkAllHeld

      private boolean checkAllHeld()
      Checks if all dice are currently held.
      Returns:
      true if all dice are held, false otherwise.

      scoreLabel - - The Label representing the score for the category.
